text: Put the sugar, lemon juice, orange juice and split vanilla pod to a saucepan. Do not discard vanilla seeds. Bring to the boil. Boil for five minutes to reduce the mixture by half. Reduce to a simmer and add the cherries. Simmer for another five minutes. Stir regularly to prevent sticking. Remove from the heat and allow to cool. Take out the vanilla pod before serving. Serve. This is an excellent syrup for ice cream, cake, cheesecake, and pancakes.
